original_text: ‘The Lord Almighty, Israel's God says, “Take these two pieces of paper that have the agreement about the sale of land. Take the piece that has a seal on it and the piece without a seal. Put them both in a clay jar to keep them safe for a long time.”
korean_text: 만군의 여호와 이스라엘의 하나님께서 이와 같이 말씀하시기를 너는 이 증서 곧 봉인하고 봉인하지 않은 매매 증서를 가지고 토기에 담아 오랫동안 보존하게 하라

sentences.original_text: The Lord Almighty, Israel's God says,
Take these two pieces of paper
that have the agreement about the sale of land.
Take the piece that has a seal on it
and the piece without a seal.
Put them both in a clay jar
sentences.korean_translation: 그것들을 둘 다 토기 항아리에 넣어라

sentences.original_text: to keep them safe for a long time.
